title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1951.2 - Central office temporary release review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1951.2 - Central office temporary release review

State Regulations

Central office temporary release will review the inmate's
suitability for work release or presumptive work release, pursuant to the
provisions of Part 1900 of this Title. However, an inmate may only be deemed
unsuitable for presumptive work release approval based upon one or more of the
following criteria: (a) crime of
commitment; (b) criminal
history; (c) custodial adjustment; or
(d) outstanding
warrants/detainers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1951.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
